input.sentences: today we went to the ice race track .
we had so much fun trying different kinds of car .
my favorite one was the black coupe .
we did spins and had a lot of fun .
output.sentences: Consumer reports magazine tests vehicles ability to navagate the snowy conditions.
They like to rank each type of vehicle for safety.
This vehicle ranks highest in all weather conditions during driving.
The blue sports car didn't rate as well in icy road conditions.
Finally, the sport utility is ranked most popular especially for driving in snow and icy weather.
